description: Monitor for execution of AppleScript through osascript and usage of the NSAppleScript and OSAScript APIs that may be related to other suspicious behavior occurring on the system. Analytic 1 - Look for unusual OS API execution related to AppleScript. sourcetype=macOS:Syslog OR sourcetype=macOS:Process | search (process_name="*NSAppleScript*" OR process_name="*OSAScript*")
